Package planetarium.solarsystem

Class Planet

java.lang.Object
planetarium.solarsystem.CelestialBody
planetarium.solarsystem.Planet
public class Planet extends CelestialBody
Represents a planet that orbits a star.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    MAX_NUMBER_OF_MOONS
    The maximum number of moons that can orbit a planet.

    • findMoon

      public Moon findMoon(String identifier)
      Given an identifier, it searches for a moon around the planet with the same identifier. WARNING: It does not search for moons on another planets! WARNING: Acelestial body that is not a planet will not be found given its identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier of the moon we are searching
      Returns:
      The instance of the moon searched. May return null if the moon is not found.
      See Also:
      • Moon

    • addNewMoon

      public void addNewMoon(Position moonRelativePosition, long moonMass)
      Creates a new moon orbiting the planet. WARNING: It may not create the moon if it exceeds the max number.
      Parameters:
      moonRelativePosition - the new moon's position relative to the planet.
      moonMass - the new moon's mass.
      See Also:
      • Moon

    • addNewMoon

      public void addNewMoon(long relativeX, long relativeY, long moonMass)
      Creates a new moon orbiting the planet. WARNING: It may not create the moon if it exceeds the max number.
      Parameters:
      relativeX - the new moon's offset along the x-axis relative to the planet.
      relativeY - the new moon's offset along the y-axis relative to the planet.
      moonMass - the new moon's mass.
      See Also:
      • Moon

    • removeOldMoon

      public void removeOldMoon(String identifier)
      Removes a moon orbiting the planet given an identifier. WARNING: If the identifier corresponds to a moon of another planet, the moon will not be deleted.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier of the moon to be removed.
      See Also:
      • Moon

    • removeFromSystem

      public void removeFromSystem()
      Removes the planet from the system, and does it from the planet's instance.

    • distanceToStar

      public double distanceToStar()
      Calculates the distance from the planet to its star, equivalently its orbiting radius.
      Returns:
      the distance from the planet to its star.
      See Also:
      • Star
